name: Yincheng Jin
content: Yincheng Jin - Our Faculty | School of Computing | Binghamton University Skip to main content School of Computing Our Faculty Yincheng Jin Assistant Professor School of Computing yjin5@binghamton.edu 607-777-4593 EB Q05 BackgroundYincheng Jin is an assistant professor at Binghamton University's School of Computing. He received his PhD in computer science (2023) from University at Buffalo. Before that, he was an intern in the Digital Health Department, Samsung Research America. Jin's research lies in the intersection of human-computer interaction (HCI), mobile computing and artificial intelligence. He is particularly interested in developing intelligent HCI, mobile systems and machine learning algorithms to promote health and well-being goals.EducationPhD, University at Buffalo, SUNYResearch InterestsHuman-computer interaction (HCI)Smart healthMobile computingMachine learningRelated News Stories6 Binghamton University faculty members win $4.4 million in CAREER Awards from National Science FoundationNSF CAREER award to fund research improving sign language education Return to Top Last Updated: 3/31/25
